bioconda.name: bioconductor-riboprofiling
bioconda.summary: Ribosome Profiling Data Analysis: from BAM to Data Representation and Interpretation

biotools.summary: Starting with a BAM file, this package provides the necessary functions for quality assessment, read start position recalibration, the counting of reads on CDS, 3'UTR, and 5'UTR, plotting of count data: pairs, log fold-change, codon frequency and coverage assessment, principal component analysis on codon coverage.

bioschemas.name: RiboProfiling
bioschemas.summary: Starting with a BAM file, this package provides the necessary functions for quality assessment, read start position recalibration, the counting of reads on CDS, 3'UTR, and 5'UTR, plotting of count data: pairs, log fold-change, codon frequency and coverage assessment, principal component analysis on codon coverage.
